item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 25, 2025 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. German parliament votes as a Git contribution graph (288 points | 86 comments)
2. Status as a Service (2019) (16 points | 2 comments)
3. Troy Hunt – A Sneaky Phish Just Grabbed My Mailchimp Mailing List (4 points | discuss)
4. The Lost Art of Commit Messages (14 points | 7 comments)
5. Search My Site – open-source search engine for personal and independent websites (74 points | 19 comments)
6. Qwen2.5-VL-32B: Smarter and Lighter (439 points | 219 comments)
7. Triforce – a beamformer for Apple Silicon laptops (511 points | 190 comments)
8. 'No Other Land' Filmmaker Beaten and Detained, Claims Activist Group (12 points | discuss)
9. WWI's 'Dazzle' Camouflage Seemed Effective Due to Unexpected Optical Trick (58 points | 20 comments)
10. Three Hundred Years Later, a Tool from Isaac Newton Gets an Update (71 points | 12 comments)
11. Why we chose LangGraph to build our coding agent (7 points | discuss)
12. Show HN: I'm a teacher and built an AI presentation tool (170 points | 70 comments)
13. Brain Scans of Infants Reveal the Moment We Start Making Memories (39 points | 7 comments)
14. CO2 laser enables long-range detection of radioactive material (84 points | 16 comments)
15. The Lost Towers of the Guelph-Ghibelline Wars (15 points | 10 comments)
16. MRubyD: A new mruby virtual machine implemented in pure C# (72 points | 18 comments)
17. Reflecting on WikiTok (10 points | discuss)
18. Can Parrot Brains Teach Us About Human Speech? (20 points | 2 comments)
19. Intel: A Bug and a Pro (49 points | 27 comments)
20. The earliest versions of the first C compiler known to exist (337 points | 155 comments)
21. I won't connect my dishwasher to your cloud (576 points | 371 comments)
22. Project Operation Whitecoat (2010) (101 points | 82 comments)
23. Aircraft detection at planetary scale (73 points | 60 comments)
24. The Prospero Challenge (85 points | 31 comments)
25. 600M years of shared environmental stress response found in algae and plants (84 points | 5 comments)
26. Arc-AGI-2 and ARC Prize 2025 (163 points | 74 comments)
27. Autology: A Lisp with access to its own interpreter (121 points | 46 comments)
28. Gatehouse – a composable, async-friendly authorization policy framework in Rust (63 points | 26 comments)
29. David Lynch Presents Interview Project (29 points | discuss)
30. Teardown, Optimization: Comsol 8Gb USB Flash Stick (2015) (6 points | discuss)
